phrases: For one still so young, your calligraphy is highly conformist.
I do not know if it is better described as copybook-style,
or made simply to win calligraphy awards.
Did you even attempt to scale the wall of mediocrity?
Managing the hall for many years has given me a discerning eye.
And your calligraphy is just plain dull.
Say, I took these photos earlier...
What is wrong with my calligraphy?!
What are you doing, you idiot?!
He cannot insult me like that!
He does not even know how hard I have worked!
*Buses 1-7 only in service June 14 to July 31 Note: Bus service may be suspended in the event that flights are suspended.
Haneda Airport: SNA033 dpt 10:00 Nagasaki Airport: arrive 11:50 Nagasaki Airport: AHA 4674 dpt 13:20 Fukue Airport: arrive 14:00 Board taxi at Fukue Airport.
After you arrive at location on map, contact Village Chief Kido Yuujirou.
If I had not come by,
it mighta taken you more'n half a day get to Nanatsutake Village!
Mighta taken half a day's walk!
Uh, I cannot understand what you are saying.
Are not got no clue what yer sayin'.
Always a-squealin' with glee at th'sight.
Maybe it does not look pretty because my heart's gone hard?
This is as far as I take you.
The sea not lookin' pretty to you, sonny,
are not'because your heart's gone hard.
It is just'cuz it gets cloudy in th'afternoon.
Th'sea's worth seein''specially when your heart's gone hard.
Uh, could you help me bring them inside?
Oh, our company does not do that.
Customer service turns lousy when they do not have any competitors.
You have had a long trip from Tokyo, eh?
Does this place have no buses, or trains, or anything?
A bus stops by once a day.
You can call for a taxi, but there are not many of them.
You can borrow my car when you need to go to town.
At any rate, could you leave me alone for a week?
I want to immerse myself in writing.
Here, let me try the key.
Take all the time you need for writing.
You will not have to worry about food, either.
There is nobody living here, right?
You are just imagining it, really.
Oh, do not worry about them.
Never used a balanced-flue bath heater before?
You crank this to light the flame.
I have to live in a place like this?
There is definitely something in here...
Seems she is made this house her base.
Oh, more of a colony, really.
Uh, that makes even less sense.
I told her to leave, but...
It is rude to ask questions like that.
But Miwa-nee was sayin', Junon Boys look really cool.
This guy looks really cool, so he is a Junon Boy!
That is not entirely incorrect, but this man is a master calligrapher.
He is a Junon Boy who can also do calligraphy!
I still think he is a Junon Boy.
But he is past the age where you would call him a boy, see?
But do not people on TV claim they are younger'n they are?
Well, fudgin' numbers in their favor may just be part of the job.
And cowboys are boys even when they are old!
But it is lucky for me that it already has some semblance of living space.
How did you get in here?!
Who does he think he is?
Just because he won a prize.
He punched the exhibit hall director.
Now he is basically dead to the calligraphy world.
They might think you are like him.
Do not have anything to do with him.
Spring Summer Fall Winter Praying To Deaf Ears Independence And Self-Respect Enemies On All Sides
Is there a kettle in this house?
You got to eat Corn Cones in stacks like this!
I have got metabolic syndrome, so one at a time's plenty.
I cannot do calligraphy like this.
Did I say you could write anything?
Do not be so uptight, Junon Boy.
I told you, I am not a Junon Boy.
Just like you have the name Kotoishi Naru...
How did you know my name?!
Are you really that stupid, or do you think I am?
I know your name too, Junon Boy!
Junon aside, where did you get Takeo?
This is like a middle schooler's pen name!
It is just like how my teacher at school writes.
I do not know if it is better described as copybook-style...
Your calligraphy is just plain dull.
You worked hard to write that so good!
What do you know about my writing?!
Do not talk like you know anything!
What is a grown man doing, flipping out whenever someone hits the bull's eye?
You are going to an island?
I should go cool my head...
He said, You are still flawed as a human being, let alone a calligrapher.
You punched an old man who uses a cane.
Dad and that geezer just do not get it.
What is wrong with being faithful to the fundamentals?
It is a given that the fundamentals make the most beautiful writing.
I am not wrong about that.
What is the most important thing?
What is the most important thing?
I am not going to apologize!
I am the one who was pesterin' you.
But, I just could not write'them the way you do.
You did not do anything wrong.
There is nothing to even forgive.
I am so glad you forgave me!
I was mighty scared of apologizin' to you.
But now I am really glad I did.
I am sorry I yelled at you.
Still, you worked hard to write this.
You write just like the copybook!
What did you do that for?!
Anyway, you do not even get why I was upset.
This is just practice calligraphy, so it is meant to be thrown awa
You did it to me first!
Do not go scarin' me like that!
I thought you up an' died!
I am about to die in these heavy clothes.
That is the problem with you city folk!
First, plug up the neck of your T-shirt.
An' catch a bunch of air under your shirt.
I am impressed, in spite of myself.
Do you always swim in water this deep?
The power of childhood is terrifying.
I am going to show you something real nice!
If you climb that there wall, you can see a mighty fine sunset!
Got To climb to see it.
I do not need to see the sunset.
You cannot see anything through all those clouds.
You will not know'til you climb up and see.
You do not try, you do not get to look.
If you do not climb up here, you will not get to see nothing!
even attempt to scale the wall of mediocrity?
Better hurry on down or I will open yer boxes myself!
Yer movin' in, so I done come to pitch in!
That is a mighty long way.
We will be lettin' ourselves in.
Did your grandfather call them over?
Ever'body saw the moving van and came themselves.
Not many people move in'round here.
But, they do not know me...
I cannot make them do that...
My, what a fine young man.
So, I should not talk to you, then?
Looks like Hina wants you to pay attention to her.
Hina cries even when she is happy.
This is hard to deal with!
I told you in our class meeting that butt jabs are not allowed!
That punk will not shape up, no matter what I tell him.
The head teacher at the branch school.
Ahh, are not nothing funnier than seein' a handsome guy gettin' disgraced.
Mind if we bring the boxes in?
I kind of see the reason why Dad had me come to this island.
If I write anything good, I will send it for display.
Would you apologize to the director for me?
No way, I cannot do that yet...
I think I will manage somehow.
